mapper.select: SELECT recurring_config_seq, recurring_nm, execution_interval_type, category_cd, store_cd, amount, remarks, linking_data_type, active_flg, created_at, updated_at FROM recurring_config ORDER BY recurring_config_seq

SELECT recurring_config_seq, recurring_nm, execution_interval_type, category_cd, store_cd, amount, remarks, linking_data_type, active_flg, created_at, updated_at FROM recurring_config WHERE recurring_config_seq = #{recurringConfigSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recurring_config ( recurring_nm, execution_interval_type, category_cd, store_cd, amount, remarks, linking_data_type, active_flg, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{recurringNm}, #{executionIntervalType}, #{categoryCd}, #{storeCd}, #{amount}, #{remarks}, #{linkingDataType}, #{activeFlg}, NOW(), NOW() )
